description: Alfanous is a Quranic search engine provides simple and advanced search services in the diverse information of the Holy Quran .
json_output_system_note:
This is the JSON output system of Alfanous project .This feature is in Alpha test and the Json schema may be it's not stable . We are waiting for real feadbacks and suggestions to improve its efficacity,quality and stability. To contact the author ,please send a direct email to assem.ch[at]gmail.com or to the mailing list alfanous [at] googlegroups.com

For more details visit the page of this service here
console_note: this is console interface of Alfanous, try -h to get help
